msbt.message: I'll hurry and unpack! I wanna play lots when I'm done, !
If I don't get unpacked today, it'll be another day until I find folks to play with.So I'm gonna get all my stuff out of the boxes and on the floor where it belongs!
A huh huh! Since I'm starting over here, I'm gonna be the best decorator!
Cleaning up is hard work! I've been taking it real easy, but that isn't getting the job done!
I'm hungry! Gotta hurry and unpack so I can find which box has my food jars, !
Whoa! It's already dark out?! I've been unpacking all day, and I'm still not done, !
Man, I gotta put stuff somewhere. A different somewhere than it is now, I mean.
Hmm If I put that thereis that close enough to where I wanna keep my snacks?
Hmm It'd be kinda cool if I put this on that, and it all went over there Gurglegurgle! Shh, tummyâ€”I'm thinking!
Oh! Did you hear me? A huh huh. I can't decide where to put all my furniture!
